text: NFL on Fox Marquise Goodwin played with a lot of heart on Sunday. Just hours before the game, Goodwin and his wife Morgan lost their infant son due to complications after he had to be delivered prematurely. On the field, later the same day, Goodwin broke free for an 83 - yard touchdown. After beating Giants Janoris Jenkins and securing the catch, Goodwin blew a kiss to the sky before stepping into the end zone. He then fell to his knees, where his teammates surrounded him. You can watch the emotional play below. After the game, Goodwin shared a photo to his Instagram account, including a message that explained what had happened.
